mapper.select: /* USE : VirtualLoginMapper.checkVirtualLoginAuth */ SELECT COUNT(twri.RESRCE_CD) AS CNT FROM TB_WB_RESRCE_INFO twri WHERE twri.RESRCE_CD IN ( SELECT twagr.RESRCE_CD FROM TB_WB_AUTHOR_GRP_RESRCE twagr WHERE twagr.AUTH_GRP_CD = ( SELECT twui.AUTH_GRP_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_INFO twui WHERE twui.USER_ID = #{0} ) AND twagr.RESRCE_CD = '000085' AND twagr.USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT twae.RESRCE_CD FROM TB_WB_AUTHOR_EXCEPT_V01 twae WHERE twae.USER_ID = #{0} AND twae.RESRCE_CD = '000085' AND twae.INCLD_EXCLD_FG = 'I' AND twae.USE_YN = 'Y' )

/* USE : VirtualLoginMapper.checkVirtualLoginAuthCheck */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS authResult FROM ( SELECT A.HQ_OFFICE_CD , A.HQ_OFFICE_NM , B.STORE_CD , B.STORE_NM , B.CLS_FG , B.SYS_STAT_FG , B.OWNER_NM , B.TEL_NO , B.AGENCY_CD , B.SYS_OPEN_DATE , B.SYS_CLOSURE_DATE FROM TB_HQ_OFFICE A , TB_MS_STORE B WHERE B.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+) = A.HQ_OFFICE_CD ) tms LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MS_EMPLOYEE tme ON tms.STORE_CD = tme.STORE_CD AND tme.EMP_NO = '0000' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_HQ_EMPLOYEE the ON tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = the.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND the.EMP_NO = '0000' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM_AGENCY tca ON tms.AGENCY_CD = tca.AGENCY_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM_EMPLOYEE tce ON tca.AGENCY_CD = tce.AGENCY_CD AND tce.EMP_NO = '0000' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM_NMCODE tcm_cls_fg ON tms.CLS_FG = tcm_cls_fg.NMCODE_CD AND tcm_cls_fg.NMCODE_GRP_CD = '001' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM_NMCODE tcm_sys_stat_fg ON tms.SYS_STAT_FG = tcm_sys_stat_fg.NMCODE_CD AND tcm_sys_stat_fg.NMCODE_GRP_CD = '005' WHERE 1=1 -- 본사권한 접근시 AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tme.USER_ID = #{userIdCkeck}
-- 총판권한 접근시 AND tca.AGENCY_CD = #{agencyCd} AND ( tme.USER_ID = #{userIdCkeck} OR the.USER_ID = #{userIdCkeck} )
